header.title: snmpa_error_report

erlref.modulesummary: Behavior module for reporting SNMP agent errors.

description.p: This module defines the behavior of the agent error reporting.
The functions in this module must be exported from an snmpa_error_report-compliant module.

func.name: config_err(Format, Args) -> void()
func.fsummary: Called if a configuration error occurs.

desc.p: The function is called if an error occurs during the configuration phase, for example, if a syntax error is found in a configuration file.

Format and Args are as in
io:format(Format, Args) in STDLIB.

func.name: user_err(Format, Args) -> void()
func.fsummary: Called if a user-related error occurs.

desc.p: The function is called if a user-related error occurs at runtime, for example, if a user-defined instrumentation function returns erroneous.

Format and Args are as in
io:format(Format, Args) in STDLIB.
